title: Device Posture Integrations
description: Device posture integrations allow third party APIs to act as device posture providers

links.title: List Device Posture Integrations
links.description: List Device Posture Integrations for an account

links.title: Device Posture Integration Details
links.description: Fetch a single Device Posture Integration

links.title: Create Device Posture Integration
links.description: Create a new Device Posture Integration
links.curl:
curl -X POST "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/devices/posture/integration" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"workspace_one","name":"My Workspace One Integration","interval":"10m","config":{"api_url":"https://as123.awmdm.com/API","auth_url":"https://na.uemauth.vmwservices.com/connect/token","client_id":"example client id","client_secret":"example client secret"}}'

type.description: The type of Device Posture Integration.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Integration.

interval.description: The interval between each posture check with the third party API. Use "m" for minutes (e.g. "5m") and "h" for hours (e.g. "12h")

api_url.description: The Workspace One API URL provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

auth_url.description: The Workspace One Authorization URL depending on your region

client_id.description: The Workspace One client ID provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

client_secret.description: The Workspace One client secret provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

config.description: The configuration object containing third party integration information

links.title: Update Device Posture Integration
links.curl:
curl -X PATCH "https://api.cloudflare.com/client/v4/accounts/699d98642c564d2e855e9661899b7252/devices/posture/integration/f174e90a-fafe-4643-bbbc-4a0ed4fc8415" \
     -H "X-Auth-Email: user@example.com" \
     -H "X-Auth-Key: c2547eb745079dac9320b638f5e225cf483cc5cfdda41" \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     --data '{"type":"workspace_one","name":"My Workspace One Integration","interval":"10m","config":{"api_url":"https://as123.awmdm.com/API","auth_url":"https://na.uemauth.vmwservices.com/connect/token","client_id":"example client id","client_secret":"example client secret"}}'

type.description: The type of Device Posture Integration.

name.description: The name of the Device Posture Integration.

interval.description: The interval between each posture check with the third party API. Use "m" for minutes (e.g. "5m") and "h" for hours (e.g. "12h")

api_url.description: The Workspace One API URL provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

auth_url.description: The Workspace One Authorization URL depending on your region

client_id.description: The Workspace One client ID provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

client_secret.description: The Workspace One client secret provided in the Workspace One Admin Dashboard

config.description: The configuration object containing third party integration information
